headline: Good Small Bank

headline: Small bank commercial lender
pros:
Nice people; get to know everybody; easy to talk to 
Little bureaucracy ; good benefits ; office with door; good parking and location
cons: Very small bank; not a lot of resources or administrative support  office did not have good visibility from the street

headline: Company with potential but no strong leadership
